entries.arrived_at_loc: You have arrived at the transmission location. Stand by to begin tranmission interception.
entries.attack_notify: pcontrast1 Tactical Computer:pcontrast3 <Enemy fighters detected on an interception course.>
entries.attack_stopped: pcontrast1 Tactical Computer:pcontrast3 <Enemy fighter wave has been elimated.>
entries.first_attack: You have been spotted by enemy fighters. Hold them off until you have finished recieving that transmission.
entries.found_loc: Optimum transmission location dectected. Proceed to the designated area immediately.
entries.mission_complete: Good work, pilot. We have the Rebel transmission. Return to your superior officer and make a full report.
entries.outofrange: pcontrast1 Tactical Computer:pcontrast3 <Tranmission signal interrupted. Return to the optimum transmission location immediately.>
entries.outofrange_failed: We lost the signal! You moved to far away from the transmission location. Report your failure to your superior officer, pilot.
entries.quest_defendpoint_d: When you begin intercepting the Rebel communications, they will send out fighters to try to destroy you. Defend yourself but do not leave the area until the operation is completed.
entries.quest_location_d: Travel to the Dantooine system and intercept the Rebel communications. Once in the Dantooine system, you will receive a navigation waypoint to the Rebel communications relay point. Travel to that location and wait for the interception operation to begin.
entries.quest_reachpoint_d: Once you have arrived at the navigation waypoint, wait until the interception operation begins. Once the operation begins, you will need to remain in the area until it completes. You will receive regular updates on how long you have until the operation is over. If you move too far away from the navigation waypoint you will receive a warning message. If you remain outside of the area for too long the mission will fail.
entries.quest_reachpoint_t: Start the Interception of the Rebel Signal
entries.title: Dantooine System: Intercept the Enemy Signal
entries.title_d: Travel to the Dantooine system and intercept the Rebel communications. When you enter the Dantooine system you will receive a navigation waypoint to the Rebel communications relay point. Travel to this waypoint and wait for the interception operation to begin. In order to succeed, you need to stay near the navigation waypoint. If you move too far away you will receive a warning message for you to return. Once the interception operation begins the Rebels will send out fighters to attack you. Defend yourself against attack but do not leave the area until the Rebel message is completely received.
entries.trans_update: Transmission Update:<%DI percent of transmission received.>
entries.transmission_start: Transmission Updata:<Signal located. Beginning transmission interception now.>
